cards.title: Currency app
cards.cardContent: This is a simple currency app that fetching data from national polish bank.

cardContentColapse.secondParagraph: Registration and login page, list of all available currencies from national polish bank API, list of fauvorite currencies of user
cardContentColapse.thirdParagraph: Technology stack: React, Redux, Material-ui, Firebase, React-router, Eslint/Prettier and more...

cards.title: Project pizzeria
cards.cardContent: This is a pizzeria website where you can order pizza or book a table

cardContentColapse.secondParagraph: This app have three pages wich are: main page, order page where you can order pizzeria products and booking page where you can book a table for you in hours when you need
cardContentColapse.thirdParagraph: Technology stack: html, css, sass, es6

cards.title: Travel agency
cards.cardContent: This is a travel agency website where you can find many nice travels and form to order it

cardContentColapse.secondParagraph: There are several pages of travel destinations and filter for it. You can find travels in diferent countries or duration. Travel to place with beach or mountains and more
cardContentColapse.thirdParagraph: Technology stack: React, Redux, Material-ui, Firebase, React-router, Eslint/Prettier and more...

cards.title: Internet shop
cards.cardContent: This is a internet shop e-comerce webpage

cardContentColapse.secondParagraph: This is a simple website with carousel and several sections with clothes building with Bootstrap
cardContentColapse.thirdParagraph: Technology stack: html, css, sass, Bootstrap

cards.title: Simple To-do List
cards.cardContent: This is a to-do list with posibility to create, edit and find lists. Also you can drag-n-drop your tasks between columns

cardContentColapse.secondParagraph: To-Do list app biulded with react. Drag-n-drop functionality, add lists or elements and more..
